scripts.serve: npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only functions
scripts.postdeploy: gcloud run services update fetchnews --region us-central1 --no-invoker-iam-check --project eveilable-6bda0 && gcloud run services update generatearticle --region us-central1 --no-invoker-iam-check --project eveilable-6bda0 && gcloud run services update generatequestions --region us-central1 --no-invoker-iam-check --project eveilable-6bda0 && gcloud run services update evaluatesummary --region us-central1 --no-invoker-iam-check --project eveilable-6bda0
